title: Biden to Meet With Pope Francis Ahead of G-20 Summit
sub_head: The second Catholic U.S. president, Biden speaks often about his faith
body:
Pope Francis and President Biden will meet at the Vatican on Oct. 29 amid controversy among U.S. bishops over the second Catholic president’s support for abortion rights.
The White House announced the meeting, which was widely expected, on Thursday. It will take place during Mr. Biden’s coming trip to Europe, where he will take part in a G-20 summit in Rome and the United Nations climate summit, COP26, in Glasgow. First lady Jill Biden will also participate.
